scripts.export: next build && next export && powershell -NoProfile -Command "$ErrorActionPreference='Stop'; $root=$PWD; $src=Join-Path $root 'out'; $maybeNested=Join-Path $src 'site'; $srcToCopy=(Test-Path $maybeNested) ? $maybeNested : $src; $dest=Resolve-Path '..\public\site'; if (!(Test-Path $dest)) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $dest | Out-Null }; Copy-Item -Path (Join-Path $srcToCopy '*') -Destination $dest -Recurse -Force"
